UsersList.confirmDeleteText: Are you sure you want to delete "{userName}"? The record will be permanently deleted after 30 days.

errors.eventIdRequiredForOrganiser: Event ID is required for organiser role
errors.eventIdRequiredForTeamLead: Event ID is required for team-lead role
errors.teamIdRequiredForTeamLead: Team ID is required for team-lead role

UserForm.duplicateAdminRole: This user already has an admin role
UserForm.duplicateOrganiserRole: This user already has an organiser role for this event
UserForm.duplicateTeamLeadRole: This user already has a team lead role for this event and team

UserForm.eventAndTeamRequired: Event and team are required for team lead role

NavBar.screenReaderDialogDescription: Navigation menu with links to different sections of the application

Metadata.description: A system to support the organisation of alternative arts events

SignInPage.title: Sign In
SignInPage.descriptionOne: Sign in to your account to continue.
SignInPage.descriptionTwo: We use our ticket system, Pretix, to provide a single sign-on experience.
SignInPage.descriptionThree: Clicking the button below will redirect you to the Pretix login page.
SignInPage.descriptionFour: After logging in, you will be redirected back to this application.
SignInPage.forgotDescription: Enter your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
SignInPage.forgotSuccessMessage: If an account exists for that email, we've sent a reset link. Check your inbox.
SignInPage.invalidCredentials: Invalid email or password. Please try again.

SignUpPage.title: Create account
SignUpPage.description: Enter your details to create an account.
SignUpPage.signInLink: Already have an account? Sign in

ForgotPasswordPage.title: Forgot password
ForgotPasswordPage.description: Enter your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
ForgotPasswordPage.successMessage: If an account exists for that email, we've sent a reset link. Check your inbox.

ResetPasswordPage.title: Reset password
ResetPasswordPage.invalidToken: This reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.
ResetPasswordPage.missingToken: Missing reset token. Please use the link from your email.
